player module¶

class player.Player¶

Bases: object

displayGrids()¶

Displays the game boards for the player

guess(position, player)¶

Method that determines if the players guess was correct or incorrect :param position: A 2-tuple which represents the position the player thinks the enemy ship is located :param player: A player object which represents the current player that is guessing :return: Returns true if it is a hit and False if it is a miss

placeShip(start, end)¶

Method that adds a ship and its coordinates to the ship list and game board :param start: A 2-tuple representing a start coordinate :param end: A 2-tuple representing an end coordinate

removeSunkShips()¶

Removes ships that are sunk from the players shipList and is called for a player at the start of their turn
